issue.title: [JS] Document how to run tests without building
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12275](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12275). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/js/DEVELOP.md does not document that one can run `npm run test – -t src`. 

Also document how to run tests with VSCode.
